description.narrative:
Organisationen för Amerikanska Staters särskilda fredsmission i Colombia (engelska akronym MAPP/OAS) har inkommit med ett förslag till den Svenska Ambassaden i Bogota om finansiering för 30 MSEK till stöd för implementering av fredsmissionens aktiviteter, i linje med deras strategiska Note 2016–2021, under perioden 1 juli 2019 – 21 december 2021.
Insatsens övergripande mål är att stödja den colombianska statens fredspolitik genom omfattade uppföljning, medföljning och stöd till de specifika aktiviteter inom de tematiska områden med syfte att bistå med rekommendationer som bidrar till konsolideringen av en långvarig fred, i linje med mandatet som avtalats mellan Organisationen för Amerikanska Stater och colombianska regering. Aktiviteter är fokuserade på tre huvudområden: fredsbyggande; säkerhetsförhållanden och territoriell dynamik; och övergångsrättvisa och avväpning, demobilisering och återintegrering (DDR).

The Organization of American States Mission to Support the Peace Process in Colombia (MAPP/OAS) has submitted a proposal to the Embassy of Sweden in Bogotá for funding of 30 MSEK to support the implementation of activities of the Mission in line with its Strategic Note 2016-2021, during the period July 1, 2019 - December 31, 2021.
The main objective of the intervention is to support the Colombia State's peace policy through a comprehensive monitoring, accompaniment and support to specific activities within the thematic areas, with the aim of providing recommendations that contribute to the consolidation of a long-lasting peace, in line with the mandate agreed between the Organization of American States and the Colombian government. The activities are focused in three main areas: Peacebuilding; security conditions and territorial dynamics; and transitional justice and disarmament, demobilization and reintegration (DDR).

The main objective of the Mission to support the Peace Process of the Organization of American States (MAPP/OAS) is to support the Colombian States peace policy to contribute to the consolidation of a long-lasting peace. This will be achieved through specific results planned in the three main thematic areas: 1) Peacebuilding 2) Security conditions and territorial dynamics 3)Transitional Justice and disarmament, demobilization and reintegration (DDR) The activities within these areas are implemented through a comprehensive monitoring, accompaniment, and support, by the 18 regional offices in the country and the central office in Bogotá.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

tag.narrative: 16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.

title.narrative: Decision on contribution on Support to MAPP/OAS Colombia

description.narrative: MAPP/OAS has contributed to strengthen the capacity of governmental entities and civil society in peace building through capacity building and accompaniment (during the lockdown due to the Covid-19 pandemic this was done virtually). It has also contributed to the government's analysis of the conflict through strategic information, analysis and recommendations on the security conditions of the territories; on strategies to reduce illicit crops; on the situation in the boarders, and local conflicts. MAPP/OAS has also contributed to strengthen victims' participation in the Transitional Justice system and the Special Jurisdiction for Peace through technical assistance for the elaboration of reports and providing specific recommendations to the Special Jurisdiction for Peace on the macro cases, on protection measures and security for the participants in the hearings.MAPP/OAS accompaniment, monitoring and technical assistance contributes to the implementation of the Peace Agreement and other [possible] peace processes, and to the implementation of the Swedish Development Cooperation Strategy 2021-2025 for Colombia. For the latter, the support contributes to the Result area "Peaceful and inclusive societies" and its both objectives; "Negotiated peace and transitional justice implementation" and "Peace-building and institutional presence in conflict-affected areas". MAPP/OAS is a strategic actor for peacebuilding in Colombia and its relevance lies mainly on their presence in the regions highly affected by the internal armed conflict; on the confidence gained within the national/local governments and the civil society; on their neutrality and impartiality; and on the discretion in handling the information and relationships with the government and the communities. This has been confirmed and highlighted by an external evaluation from 2021. MAPP/OAS has contributed to the strengthening of the government's analysis of the conflict through strategic information, analysis and recommendations on the security conditions of the regions; on strategies to reduce illicit crops; on the situation in the boarders, and local conflicts. They have also contributed to strengthening the victim's participation in the Transitional Justice system and the Special Jurisdiction for Peace for the presentation of reports; and has also provided recommendations to the Special Jurisdiction for Peace for the macro cases and for the security of the participants in the hearings.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
